name: Fast food fast eat (Tri Jam 146)
description:
Welcome to my entrie at the Trijam 146

The Theme was Fast food, fast dude. A game made in just 3 hours is a big challenge.  For the last two times I didnt got it in time. Now I made it in just 8 hours.

Control:

WASD or Arrowkeys to walk in direction

Enter for restart

Spacebar to jump

Escape to quit

How to play:

You have to pick up fastfood wich is shown on the top. Make combos to earn more points. Careful, the highscore does not save.

Assets I used:

Unreal engine Template

Music was created by Joel Loopez

https://zoidberg-es.itch.io/mycraft

Sounds were created by GameBurp

https://gameburp.itch.io/2000-game-sound-fx
